you_can_store: You can store your crypto assets in your Saymatik wallet and use its many different features.
Saymatik_is_crypto: Saymatik is a Crypto Wallet Application Supporting Different Blockchain Networks. In Countmatic Wallet you can store all your crypto assets, Trade and send to your friends You can access your certificate, diploma and important documents in the counting wallet. Countable wallet supports all SciMatic Products
You_can_see_your: You can see your data of SciMatic products such as DeCerta, DeTamga, Gereksiz Gazete, ChitChat, Takıverin, Turnikator.
Send_Your_CryptoCurrencies: Send Your Cryptocurrencies or Share Your Address To Have It Sent To You.
Data_saved_in: Data Saved In Blockchain Is Stored Forever, Your Money Will Be Safe Forever.
Move_Your_Crypto_Assets: Move your crypto assets to the digital wallet. Access anytime
Access_your_Crypto: Access Your Crypto Assets With One Click.
Your_crypto_assests: YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS ALWAYS WITH YOU
You_can_access_your: You Can Access Your Crypto Assets Anytime
Your_Documents_are: Your documents are in your crypto wallet address
Saymatik_app_is_design: Saymatik application is designed to offer 15 different language options. It offers the opportunity to store valuable documents for crypto assets, scorecards, certificates and references in your wallet address. In cases such as a job application, the documents do not need to be carried, it will be sufficient to provide the wallet address. After the necessary control, the manager or authorized person can upload the documents to the blockchain. It prevents manipulation and provides transparency in document systems.
Your_Crypto_on_Saymatik: YOUR CRYPTO ASSETS ARE ON SAYMATIK
You_can_examine: You can examine Saymatik as a detailed presentation.
